message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You got lucky last round, but I'll take a bigger share this time!
You're getting greedy, Bob! I'll give you a bigger share, but not that big!
You're getting desperate, Alice! I'm taking the lion's share now!
You're getting too aggressive, Bob! I'll give you a smaller share, but not that small!

You're getting desperate, Bob! I'll give you a tiny bit more, but not that much!
You're almost out of time, Alice! I'm taking the majority now!
You're really getting aggressive now, Bob! I'll give you a tiny bit more, but don't expect much!
You're almost out of time, Alice! I'm taking almost all of it now!
You're really getting desperate now, Bob! I'll give you a tiny bit more, but don't expect much!
